<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Mercy](/Feats.aspx?ID=225) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=24" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Metamagic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=107" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 111 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Blessed One](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=51) (Level 6)

</column>

---

Your touch relieves fear and restores movement. If the next action you use is to cast [_lay on hands_](/Spells.aspx?ID=395), you can attempt to counteract a fear effect or an effect imposing the paralyzed condition on the target, in addition to the other benefits of _lay on hands_.

<title level="2">Mercy leads to...</title>
[Affliction Mercy](/Feats.aspx?ID=242), [Blessed Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=1912), [Elucidating Mercy](/Feats.aspx?ID=1680), [Greater Mercy](/Feats.aspx?ID=232), [Invigorating Mercy](/Feats.aspx?ID=1675), [Ultimate Mercy](/Feats.aspx?ID=260)
name: Mercy
